name: GROM (itch)
description:
This is a Gamemaker: Studio recreation of two of my favorite moments from the movie Tron: the lightbikes and the Jai Alai scene. These aren't meant to be "copies" or recreations of the classic arcade game (okay, the lightbikes one kinda was), but tributes to the classic scenes.

Features:

  • Two two-player games based on the movie Tron.
  • Supports saveable usernames and stats
  • "Homages" (kinda) the command-prompt run computers of all.
